title: Rockson1
author: Rockson1
content: I think introducing crypto currency into any of our personal blogger page will be a welcome development, because we can tell our follower's more about crypto currency in the way that can understand more about the bitcoin investment platform where we have our owned group on different social media platform taking this to our blog can help reach people in the rural areas for them to know more about crypto space in the global world today

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: That would be great if you could put some effort into the blog and give your audience quality content. It would be beneficial for both you and crypto, you will get some quality traffic and there will be some more new people who will be able to learn more about cryptocurrency through your blog posts. If you are going to start a blog from scratch, make sure you niche it down so that your target traffic already has some bit of knowledge about cryptocurrency.

comments.author: mendace
comments.body: Quote from: Rockson1 on February 10, 2023, 08:40:34 PMI think introducing crypto currency into any of our personal blogger page will be a welcome development, because we can tell our follower's more about crypto currency in the way that can understand more about the bitcoin investment platform where we have our owned group on different social media platform taking this to our blog can help reach people in the rural areas for them to know more about crypto space in the global world todayIntroducing cryptocurrency into your personal blog could certainly be a welcome development, as it would allow you to share information about crypto with your followers and potentially reach a wider audience. By sharing information about cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and how they can be used for investment, you can help educate people, particularly those in rural areas, about the growing crypto space and its potential for the future. However, it's important to remember that cryptocurrency is still a relatively new and complex field, and it's important to be accurate and responsible in your information sharing, so as not to misinform or mislead your followers.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Depends on what information about Bitcoin we post in our personal blog space.  If we put half-baked information just to hype people about Bitcoin and a company that services it, then we are not doing anything good.  All the information should be a fact and not hype any centralized services.  If we post half-baked information, it can bring a disaster because the information isn't complete and may mislead people who are not knowledgeable about Bitcoin.  We must be responsible enough to provide Bitcoin information accurately and without any hidden agenda but only to promote Bitcoin and its economy.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: You are 10 years late. Bitcoin awareness is very high globally. Telling people how great Bitcoin is is not going to significantly improve adoption. People see that not a lot of people around them use Bitcoin so they don't have a lot of interest in it. They don't see incentive to use Bitcoin because there's no huge discounts offered by their favorite sellers if they use Bitcoin. And they know that Bitcoin has a potential to crash very fast, and this fear is bigger than the hope of increasing the value during bull market.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Quote from: Rockson1 on February 10, 2023, 08:40:34 PMI think introducing crypto currency into any of our personal blogger page will be a welcome development, because we can tell our follower's more about crypto currency in the way that can understand more about the bitcoin investment platform where we have our owned group on different social media platform taking this to our blog can help reach people in the rural areas for them to know more about crypto space in the global world todaySorry OP, the world is already aware of bitcoin and on modest scale and gradually getting to the nook and crannies of various quarters. You said well OP but do you think the rural people can be able to scale through the process involved in getting aquatinted with bitcoin just by reading? Do you think they are much flexible in learning by reading  as fast as you do?   Bitcoin has come a long way to this point and I do not think it is a new thing anymore but what I think can be done is talking to mini traders, freelancers, etc to start the adoption of bitcoin in their various quarters so as to speed up the daily transaction of bitcoin  globally. When that is done,  I think more vendors would start adopting the bitcoin to their payment schedule for potential customers that are bitcoin inclined.

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: Depends on the content of the blog, and not all people are into internet that much and reading blogs might not be their interest so there’s still no assurance for this but a good start to spread awareness.If your target is those who live in rural areas, then it’s better to have seminars and live session because I’m sure they are more active in social media than to read blogs, there’s a different way of blogging now which is more effective compare to the usual plain blogging.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Quote from: Rockson1 on February 10, 2023, 08:40:34 PMbecause we can tell our follower's more about crypto currency in the way that can understand more about the bitcoin investment platform Bitcoin and an investment platform are too different things. Although we understand that bitcoin is the actual investment but if it's about a platform, there could be other places where the readers you're educating might lead. And with this stuff, it's the reason why some have been misled by those authors and content creators because they're inserting those sponsorships that they're advertising for their readers/viewers to get directed with. E.g: Exchanges, wallets, etc.

comments.author: Old layer
comments.body: Yes on one side it really is a good idea, letting others know about Bitcoin as well as the cryptocurrency world through the social medias or blogs. On the other hand what are the possibilities that people won't see this as a means of you defrauding them. Sometimes when people see adverts or posts of crypto on socials, they tend to just ignore because to them, it's just a scam. How sure are you, that you can convince the public that you are not scamming them but trying to help. To me it's a good idea ooo but it would be a waste of your time because most people won't actually give ears to such posts.But if it's what you wish to do then there's no problem trying. There a first time for everything. You can as well give a reasonable Description and important facts, like the prices and other related issues concerning bitcoins. Then take proper analysis on the views and replies you get from each post. So you would have an idea on what your viewers are most interested in the Bitcoin world...

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: Rockson1 on February 10, 2023, 08:40:34 PMI think introducing crypto currency into any of our personal blogger page will be a welcome development, because we can tell our follower's more about crypto currency in the way that can understand more about the bitcoin investment platform where we have our owned group on different social media platform taking this to our blog can help reach people in the rural areas for them to know more about crypto space in the global world todayYeah, why not, it's someone has a personal blog or something then it's good to introduce bitcoin to his audience to at least educate them and know what bitcoin is. But don't expect something big though, I mean it's just your little help for the world to know what it is and the benefits.Let the imagination of your audience play and maybe they will invest, maybe not.At least you do your part spreading the world and that is good already. Don't force or blame yourself if they are not going to invest or buy bitcoin.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: Rockson1 on February 10, 2023, 08:40:34 PMI think introducing crypto currency into any of our personal blogger page will be a welcome developmentThere's nothing bad in making awareness about bitcoin through your own personal blog, but you need to understand how you could present the informations in a detailed manners to avoid confusion from those who will be interested in learning from what you posted, also make enough provisions for reference since it's likely that you're not going to be the one writing down those articles by yourself and let them know that doing it is it individuals risk, because you will not be responsible for any error that might come through them, you're only passing the right information and links to the public, this will help maintain your blog reputation as well.Quote from: Rockson1 on February 10, 2023, 08:40:34 PMwe can tell our follower's more about crypto currency in the way that can understand more about the bitcoin investment platformHere is not a bitcoin investment platform remember, it's a bitcoin discussion platform or community, we sole provide information on relevant aspects of using bitcoin to others that needs to research, learn or ask questions about bitcoin, i will also insist that you maintain bitcoin as your ultimate choice of passing the information.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Speaking today all information is very accessible, it is impossible to imagine that today's users have never even heard of the term bitcoin in any ins and outs they explore every corner of cyberspace. However, actually, bitcoin can be seen from various perspectives. Volatility and regulation are common in most articles about bitcoin, you only need to explain bitcoin sides which are rarely detailed in most of these articles. This way will probably get more exposure.

Imagine the current situation when any country is producing their Budget for the Financial year, they will have considered the Bitcoin and how they can either use it by taxing it or may be even make it illegal tender for that particular nation. Either way crypto currencies as whole getting published naturally. It's like the thing of tomorrow which everyone wants to have and have their attention towards it. You are just mentioning about the blogs here but if you know what I have mentioned up here then bitcoin's publicity is at its peak. Nobody needs to force write about the blog. All the popular blog sites already have content associated with the bitcoin. Meanwhile, it's now next big thing to have news about the bitcoin and it's current moves in the NEWS articles. At least 2 out 5 articles would be about blockchain, crypto, or bitcoin targeted itself. With the merchants who are using bitcoin as payment method, they are having mouth to mouth publicity with their bill boards, for example "bitcoin accepted here". Definitely bitcoin is on right path when it comes to it's marketing.

comments.body: Quote from: hatshepsut93 on February 10, 2023, 11:23:03 PMYou are 10 years late. Bitcoin awareness is very high globally.
